about_the_game:
Multiverse Designer is an innovative 3D virtual tabletop and map creator, a unique toolbox to empower storytellers and create the most immersive RPG experiences. Save hours of your time creating awe-inspiring setpieces with thousands of 3D assets, effects and features thanks to its intuitive drag-and-drop UI, customizing everything to its finest detail, from texture to lights or colors. Put your players or yourself in the heros' boots, exploring your creations with real-time fog of war and dynamic lights and shadows. You can even create epic cutscenes with animated assets, camera angles and dialogues! You can find all the details about Multiverse Designer on its main store page.

ABOUT THIS DEMO

The Multiverse Designer demo includes all the content currently available in our beta version, allowing you to create worlds and cutscenes, without any limitations for the duration of the demo. It includes +50 pre-made editable maps to kickstart your imagination, and almost 10,000 3D assets to create whatever you might think of – from buildings to vehicles, furniture, items or characters, for all kinds of settings (fantasy, sci-fi, Lovecraftian horror…). It also includes an avatar editor, so you can customize your character or NPCs. 

In this demo, you will also find a simplified version of the gameplay module, which allows you to play tabletop RPG online with your friends. It includes very basic D&D-like rules: you’ll be able to use Basic Attacks, Special Attacks, over 20 skills (like Hide, Spot, and many others), as well as 3 spells: fireball, lightning bolt, and cone of cold. These basic rules have been created with Criteria, our custom-made scripting language that will allow you to implement any rules so Multiverse Designer can automatize them for you. 

The demo includes HP and initiative tracking too, as well as full character sheet editing. It comes with two ready-to-play encounters: one against a wyvern, and another against humanoid monsters.  However, if you don’t mind doing all the bookkeeping and rules-tracking yourself, and just want Multiverse Designer as a 3D tabletop, you’ll be able to use any map created with the tool to play online with your friends. Rolling dice will be possible though! 

KEY FEATURES OF THE MULTIVERSE DESIGNER DEMO

  • Full access to Multiverse Designer map creator

  • 10,000 assets for all kinds of settings (fantasy, sci-fi, Lovecraftian horror…) 

  • +50 pre-made maps to kickstart your imagination 

  • Cutscene editor 

  • Play tabletop RPG online with your friends in the maps you create!

  • Two ready-to-play encounters with basic rules 

  • Full Steam Workshop integration

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070, AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 or equivalent 8GB GPU
